Boston, MA - Next Step Living - nextstepliving.com

Currently hiring front and back-end engineers. Join a small start-up style product and engineering team within an established company. You will help build a new customer-facing product from scratch, and deliver new features to market on a regular basis.

Next step living is an Energy Efficiency company.... through excellent product and software design, you will enable our company to grow more rapidly, and extend our positive environmental impact nationwide.

-Flexible work environment, approx 50% remote OK

-Work with: Java, Dropwizard, Postgres, Nginx, Rabbitmq, Jenkins, AWS, Docker, javascript, Angular, Typescript, Mocha / Chai, Protractor, NodeJS, Loopback.io / ExpressJS

-email: kristen.bishop@nextstepliving if interested in hearing more
